attributes.action: Nursery schools schools should only be open to the children of key workers
attributes.additional_details: Large numbers of children coming into nursery schools will strive as yet another factor for community transmission. Staff have no social distancing and have no PPE.  This puts them and the larger community at risk by spreading the new strain of covid
attributes.background: Nursery schools should only be open to key workers children. Large numbers of children and families mixing will increase community transmission and put nursery staff and their families at risk

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566718
